message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair to me!
I'll give you a slight discount, but I'm still thinking we can do better than 50/50.
I understand you want more, Bob, but I'm willing to give you a little more if you're willing to be reasonable. Let's split it 55/45.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a bigger share to make this worth my while. Your turn to think about it.
Okay, Bob, you're right, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  Let's split it 40/60 this time.  How about it?
